instruction: Please provide an update on the adoption of the TNFD framework by our company and any steps taken towards identifying, reporting, and managing our exposure to biodiversity risks. Additionally, please detail any proactive measures taken to address these risks and alleviate pressure from stakeholders.
output: Our company has made significant progress in implementing the TNFD framework, with a dedicated team focused on identifying and reporting on biodiversity risks. We have also implemented dedicated risk management practices to mitigate any potential impacts on our operations and supply chain. Our proactive stance on asset location and risk management practices has been well received by stakeholders, particularly investors who are increasingly aware of the importance of biodiversity risk management. Overall, we remain committed to staying ahead of regulatory and stakeholder expectations by continuously improving our biodiversity risk management practices.
